{"model":"claude-haiku-4-5","max_tokens":64000,"system":[{"type":"text","text":"You are manipulating a text document using TSX components.
Each block is represented as a TSX component with props.
"}],"messages":[{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There is no active selection. This is the latest state of the document (ignore previous documents, you MUST issue operations against this latest version of the document). 
The cursor is BETWEEN two blocks as indicated by cursor: true.
Prefer updating existing blocks over removing and adding (but this also depends on the user's question)."},{"type":"text","text":"[{"id":"ref1$","block":"<Paragraph textAlignment=\"left\" id=\"ref1\">I need to buy:</Paragraph>"},{"cursor":true},{"id":"ref2$","block":"<Paragraph textAlignment=\"left\" id=\"ref2\">Apples</Paragraph>"}]"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"make the first paragraph uppercase"}]}],"tools":[{"name":"file_replace","input_schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"target":{"type":"string","description":"The string to replace"},"replacement":{"type":"string","description":"The replacement string"}},"required":["target","replacement"]}}],"tool_choice":{"type":"any"},"stream":true}
